column1: Tondi Fatehpur is a town and a nagar panchayat in Jhansi district in the Indian state of Uttar Pradesh.
As of the 2001 Census of India
column2: Tondi Fatehpur had a population of 10
column3: 099. Males constituted 54% of the population and females 46%. Tondi Fatehpur had an average literacy rate of 48%
column4: lower than the national average of 59.5%: male literacy was 62%
column5: and female literacy 31%. In Tondi Fatehpur
column6: 17% of the population was under 6 years of age.
